attachments.title: Combinatorial problem in my daughter’s class
attachments.text: In Denmark, a rather substantial amount of work and effort has gone into reducing bullying in the Danish public schools. Many initiatives, which purposes are to strengthen the unity and solidarity ...
attachments.fallback: Operations Research Stack Exchange: Combinatorial problem in my daughter’s class

text: This problem seems very different from what i have in mind. Mine is an relaxation of balanced Minimum Cut with additional conditions.
I am not sure what you are trying to tell me with this link.

It was a supporting argument: the last answer is from LocalSolver and says “LocalSolver is a commercial product but if you're interested to use it for free to solve this problem, you will be welcome”.
